message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
